apoc.generate.config

Class DistributionBasedConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • apoc.generate.distribution.SimpleDegreeDistribution
      • apoc.generate.config.DistributionBasedConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RelationshipGeneratorConfig, DegreeDistribution

    public class DistributionBasedConfig
extends SimpleDegreeDistribution
implements RelationshipGeneratorConfig
    SimpleDegreeDistribution serving as a RelationshipGeneratorConfig. The sum of all degrees should be an even integer. Moreover, not all distributions correspond to a simple, undirected graph. Only graphs that satisfy Erdos-Gallai condition or equivalently the Havel-Hakimi test are valid. The distribution is tested in SimpleDegreeDistribution class.
